text:
Lentamente se movendo para retirar o pau de sua boca, o loiro solta um gemido enquanto olha o demônio, sua mão, que antes se encontrava na base do pau de Badboy, se move para masturbá-lo, a saliva cobrindo o membro ajuda a deslizar mais facilmente.
“Come on, Badboy, don’t be shy with me right now...” o ser híbrido pressiona os lábios na área acima da virilha do demônio “Let me hear you” outro beijo mais abaixo “Let those delicious sounds of yours out just for me” a mão na coxa de Badboy aperta a carne quase possessivamente, seus olhos cor de âmbar brilhavam enquanto mantinham seu foco no demônio “Please~ Badboy, I wanna hear you...” o tom do elfo soa quase suplicante.
(“Vamos, Badboy, não seja tímido comigo agora... Deixe-me ouvir você... Solte estes sons deliciosos seus só para mim... Por favor~ Badboy, eu quero ouvir você...”)
trans:
Slowly pulling his cock from the demon's mouth, the blonde let out a moan as he looked at the demon, his hand, which had been at the base of the Badboy's cock, moved to masturbate him. The saliva coating the member helped it slide more easily.
“Come on, Badboy, don’t be shy with me right now...” the hybrid pressed his lips to the area above the demon’s crotch “Let me hear you” another kiss lower down “Let those delicious sounds of yours out just for me” his hand on Badboy’s thigh squeezed the flesh almost possessively, his amber eyes gleamed as he kept his focus on the demon “Please~Badboy, I wanna hear you...” the elf’s tone was almost supplicating.
("Come on, Badboy, don’t be shy with me now... Let me hear you... Let those delicious sounds of yours out just for me... Please~Badboy, I want to hear you...")
